record.description: [Michigan defeated Chicago 12-0 at the annual Chicago-Michigan Football Game, November 28, 1895.] The Omega Club Tally Ho took its position in the Ann Arbor section of the big stand. Attending members and friends, in a coach decorated with banners and streamers, are: Misses Winter, McWilliams, Marjorie Cooke, Kane, Barger, Kennedy, Grace Freeman, Reed, Tooker, Capen, and Jenkins; Messrs. Stone, Johnson, H. Dougherty, Stevens, Arnold, Rand, Tooker, Vincent, McIntyre, B. B. Smith, Kennedy, Henning, Louis Wolf, and W. S. Bond.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See also Stagg's University, list of football games 1891-1939 complete with dates. Caption on reverse, archives stamp. Tear along the bottom. Descreened in SilverFast. USM applied in Photoshop.
